column1: This file will be used to upload data to the NelsonDB. FIELD NAMES CAN BE ADDED, BUT SHOULD BE DONE SPARINGLY

column2: For recording information about a row.

column7: Definition
A unique ID for the plot planted in the format 08PN0023. MUST BE UNIQUE
The experiment's name that this plot is a part of.
The seed ID for the seed that was planted in the row. The Seed ID is a unique ID in the format 08PN0023_001x. This is the ID that is printed on seed packets.
The pedigree of the seed that was planted. E.G. B73
The field name in which the plot was planted. Field names are unique. Example: Aurora NY
A human readable name for the row.
The number for the range in which the plot was grown.
The number for the row in which the plot was grown.
The name of the plot in which the plot was grown.
The name of the block in which the plot was grown.
The rep that this plot was a part of.
The number of kernels that were planted in the row.
The date that the plot was planted. Recommended format: 2015-01-30
The date that the plot was harvested. Recommended format: 2015-01-30
Any additioal comments for the row.

column2: For recording information about a specific field.

column7: Definition
The city,state,country,zipcode in which the field is located.
The field's unique name. MUST BE UNIQUE
The field's number.
Any additional comments about the field.

column2: For recording information about a locality.

column7: Definition
The locality's city name.
The locality's state.
The locality's country.
The locality's zipcode.
